question_stem:
Q2. How many coefficients does model M2 have (including the intercept)?
3, 4,5,6
question_stem_html:
Q2. How many coefficients does model M2 have (including the intercept)?
3, 4,5,6

choices.explanation:
Answer: 5
Explanation: Model M2 was generated with Churned be the response, and it depends on ALL other columns (4 columns) in the data frame “data”. Each column will need one coefficient. Hence, 4 coefficients for 4 variables with 1 intercept  5 in total.
Note: Married is categorical with 2 categories, hence, it needs one coefficient only, not two.
